args: We'll stop the imperial army here!
Don't let these forest fools beat you!\nAll troops, chaaaaaarge!
No, it's my fault. I know you're\nnot used to this fighting style.
It's true. I've never fought on such a\nwide-open field before, much less\nbeen face-to-face with my enemy.
I hear you, but we have to make\nour move right now, or else—
Our right flank got overwhelmed!\nThe imperials are closing in!
Okay, you there! With me!\nWe have to stop them!
(Dammit! I really wish Ranzal or Elisanne\nwere with me right now...)
(Why did things end up like this?)
Please, do not sit up! Your fever is\nfar too high for even slight activity.
D-doesn't matter... I have to fight...
Cleo...if I can still hold a sword...\nthen I intend to fight.
And I intend to strap you to this bed\nin order to stop this insane notion!
Listen to Cleo, {player_name}.\nYou need to rest.
I'll take whoever hasn't been laid low by\nthis sickness and deal with the Empire.
It is strange to see an illness spread so\nsuddenly, yet even stranger that it doesn't\nseem to affect sylvans at all.
You can write your dissertation later.\nRight now, anyone who ain't pukin'\ntheir guts out needs to come with me!
*gasp* *huff* *puff* D-damn...\nThese Empire chumps don't give up.
Welcome back, Luca. Are you well?
Yeah, I'm still upright somehow.\nHow's everyone back here? On the mend?
Alas, no. Indeed, they actually\nappear to be getting worse.
Well, that ain't good. Guess we'd better\nprioritize finding a cure ASAP.
For sure. There's no way what's left of us\ncan possibly beat back another attack.
Oh, I think we'll be okay\non that front for a while...
Might you care to explain that\nrather cryptic comment, Luca?
During the fight today, I found out the\nsame sickness has hit the Empire.
Oh yeah. Most of 'em were staggerin'\naround or straight-up collapsed—\neven the ones we didn't touch.
So THAT'S how we won\nwith so few troops. Neat!
Still, that doesn't mean we can just\nsit back and eat bon-bons all day.
Agreed. We need to find a cure\nand put a stop to this disease\nbefore things get even worse.
Not sure there's much of a ＂worse＂\nwhen the Empire's attackin' us.
Unless the rumors I've heard are true\nand sylvans are spreading the illness.
As you know, we sylvans\nare the only ones unaffected.
As such, some feel this is a nefarious plot\nfor our kind to take over the Halidom.
Your name is especially prominent\namong the local whispers, Luca.
They say you seek to claim the Halidom\nfor your very own and remove\n{player_name} from power.
Luca would NEVER do something like that!\n...He's not smart enough to think of it,\nfirst of all.
Any who know Luca recognize such\nidle gossip for exactly what it is.
But to folks that DON'T know me,\nI'm just some arrogant sylvan.
Aw, don't worry about it, Luca.\nThis'll die out quick and be replaced\nby some other nutty rumor. Trust me.
Still, taking over the Halidom and\nreplacing {player_name}...
You know? That ain't a bad idea.
You heard me, but lemme say it plain—\nyou need to clear outta the castle.
I'M the leader of the Halidom now!
